name: Teocalli
description:
Your loved one has become ill, and only the healing treasure from the hidden temple can heal them! Venture down 13 levels of procedural generated challenges to find it. Be warned, your heart belongs to the gods if you lose!

CONTROLS: 

ARROW KEYS - movement
ENTER - pick up item
SPACE - use potion
ESCAPE - quit game

**made for "7 Day Roguelike Challenge" 2019**
